trans-unit.source: Serves as the base class for designers that provide design-time support in the Visual Web Designer for controls that are derived from the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl" /> abstract class.
trans-unit.target: Serve como a classe base para designers que fornecem suporte em tempo de design no Visual Web Designer para controles que derivam da classe abstrata <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl" />.

trans-unit.source: In the Visual Web Designer, when the user switches from Source to Design view, the markup source code that describes a control derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl> class is parsed and a design-time version of the control is created on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: No Designer do Visual Web, quando o usuário alterna da origem para o modo de Design, o código de origem de marcação que descreve um controle derivado de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl> classe é analisada e uma versão de tempo de design do controle é criada na superfície de design.

trans-unit.source: When the user switches back to Source view, the design-time control is persisted to the markup source code and edited into the markup for the Web page.
trans-unit.target: Quando o usuário alternar de volta à exibição da fonte, o controle de tempo de design é persistente para o código-fonte marcação e editado na marcação da página da Web.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner> class serves as the base class for designers that provide design-time support in the Visual Web Designer for controls that are derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner> classe serve como a classe base para designers que fornecem suporte de tempo de design no Designer do Visual Web para controles que derivam de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner> class properties provide the following functionality:
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner> propriedades de classe fornecerem a seguinte funcionalidade:

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.ActionLists%2A> property returns a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> object, which typically contains an object that is derived from the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> object for each level in the inheritance tree of the designer.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.ActionLists%2A> propriedade retorna um <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> objeto, que normalmente contém um objeto que é derivado do <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> objeto para cada nível na árvore de herança do designer.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.DataTextField%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.DataValueField%2A> properties provide access to the corresponding properties of a control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl> class.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.DataTextField%2A> e <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.DataValueField%2A> propriedades fornecem acesso às propriedades correspondentes de um controle que é derivado de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl> classe.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.DataTextField%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.DataValueField%2A> indicate the fields of the data source that provide the text and value content of the list items, respectively.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.DataTextField%2A> e <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.DataValueField%2A> indicam os campos da fonte de dados que fornecem o texto e o valor de conteúdo dos itens da lista, respectivamente.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner> class methods provide the following functionality:
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner> métodos da classe fornecerem a seguinte funcionalidade:

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.DataBind%2A> method binds the associated control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl> to a design-time data source.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.DataBind%2A> método vincula o controle associado que deriva o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl> para uma fonte de dados de tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> method returns the markup that is used to render the associated control at design time.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> método retorna a marcação que é usada para renderizar o controle associado em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.GetSelectedDataSource%2A> method returns the design-time <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A> component from the associated control container.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.GetSelectedDataSource%2A> método retorna o tempo de design <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A> componente do contêiner de controle associado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.GetResolvedSelectedDataSource%2A> method returns the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A> from the control container, resolved to the design-time <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataBoundControlDesigner.DataMember%2A> property of the control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.GetResolvedSelectedDataSource%2A> método retorna o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A> do contêiner de controle, resolvido para o tempo de design <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataBoundControlDesigner.DataMember%2A> propriedade do controle.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.Initialize%2A> method prepares the designer to view and design the associated control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.Initialize%2A> método prepara o designer para exibir e criar o controle associado que deriva de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.OnDataSourceChanged%2A> method is called when the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A> for the associated control has changed.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.OnDataSourceChanged%2A> método é chamado quando o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A> para o controle associado foi alterado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A> method is used to remove additional properties from, add additional properties to, or shadow properties of the associated control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A> método é usado para remover propriedades adicionais da, adicionar propriedades adicionais para ou propriedades do controle associado que deriva de sombra a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>.

trans-unit.source: This section provides two code examples.
trans-unit.target: Esta seção fornece dois exemplos de código.

trans-unit.source: The first demonstrates how to derive a custom control designer.
trans-unit.target: A primeira demonstra como derivar um designer personalizado de controle.

trans-unit.source: The second demonstrates how to associate a derived control with a designer.
trans-unit.target: O segundo demonstra como associar um controle derivado de um designer.

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to create a class named `SimpleRadioButtonListDesigner` that inherits from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner> class.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir mostra como criar uma classe denominada `SimpleRadioButtonListDesigner` que herde o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner> classe.

trans-unit.source: The `SimpleRadioButtonListDesigner` class overrides the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.Initialize%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.OnDataSourceChanged%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: O `SimpleRadioButtonListDesigner` substituições de classe a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.Initialize%2A>, e <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.OnDataSourceChanged%2A> métodos.

trans-unit.source: The `SimpleRadioButtonListDesigner` class displays a `SimpleRadioButtonList` control on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: O `SimpleRadioButtonListDesigner` classe exibe um `SimpleRadioButtonList` controle na superfície de design.

trans-unit.source: The following code example derives the `SimpleRadioButtonList` control from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList> control, and shows how to use the <xref:System.ComponentModel.DesignerAttribute> class to associate the `SimpleRadioButtonList` control with its designer, the `SimpleRadioButtonListDesigner` class.
trans-unit.target: Deriva o exemplo de código a seguir a `SimpleRadioButtonList` controlar do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList> controlar e mostra como usar o <xref:System.ComponentModel.DesignerAttribute> classe para associar o `SimpleRadioButtonList` controle com seu designer, o `SimpleRadioButtonListDesigner` classe.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework internally constructs a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner> class when it creates the associated control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl> class on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: O .NET Framework internamente constrói uma nova instância do <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner> classe quando ele cria o controle associado que é derivado do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl> classe na superfície de design.

trans-unit.source: Gets the designer action list collection for the designer.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a coleção da lista de ações do designer para o designer.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection" /> associated with the designer.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection" /> associado com o designer.

trans-unit.source: The associated control derived from the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl" />, or a copy of that control.
trans-unit.target: O controle associado derivado de <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl" /> ou uma cópia desse controle.

trans-unit.source: Binds the specified control to the design-time data source.
trans-unit.target: Associa o controle especificado à fonte de dados em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: For the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataBoundControlDesigner> base class, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataBoundControlDesigner.DataBind%2A> method sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSourceID%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl> object to reference the design-time data source, then calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataBind%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method, and then restores the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSourceID%2A> properties to their original values.
trans-unit.target: Para o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataBoundControlDesigner> classe base a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataBoundControlDesigner.DataBind%2A> método define o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A> e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSourceID%2A> propriedades do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl> objeto a referência de fonte de dados de tempo de design, em seguida, chama o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataBind%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> método e, em seguida, restaurações o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A> e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSourceID%2A> propriedades para seus valores originais.

trans-unit.source: For the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner> class, however, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.DataBind%2A> method has no functionality, because <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem> objects were just added to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.Items%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: Para o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner> classe, no entanto, o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.DataBind%2A> método não tem nenhuma funcionalidade, porque <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem> objetos foram adicionados apenas para o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.Items%2A> coleção.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the data text field of the control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o campo de texto de dados do controle.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.DataTextField" /> of the list control.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.DataTextField" /> do controle de lista.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.DataTextField%2A> property sets or retrieves the markup to use for the design-time representation of the control at run time.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.DataTextField%2A> propriedade define ou recupera a marcação a ser usado para a representação de tempo de design do controle em tempo de execução.

trans-unit.source: This provides access via the designer to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.DataTextField%2A> property of the associated control, which corresponds to the field of the data source that provides the text content of the list items.
trans-unit.target: Fornece acesso por meio do designer para o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.DataTextField%2A> propriedade do controle associado, que corresponde ao campo da fonte de dados que fornece o conteúdo de texto dos itens da lista.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the data value field of the control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o campo de valor de dados do controle.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.DataValueField" /> of the list control.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.DataValueField" /> do controle de lista.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.DataValueField%2A> property provides access via the designer to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.DataValueField%2A> property of the associated control, which indicates the field of the data source that provides the value content of the list items.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.DataValueField%2A> propriedade fornece acesso por meio do designer para o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.DataValueField%2A> propriedade do controle associado, que indica o campo da fonte de dados que fornece o conteúdo de valor dos itens da lista.

trans-unit.source: Gets the HTML that is used to represent the control at design time.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o HTML usado para representar o controle em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> containing the markup used to render the control derived from the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl" /> at design time.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.String" /> contendo a marcação usada para renderizar o controle derivado de <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl" /> em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: If the associated control derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl> object is data-bound, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> method clears the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.Items%2A> collection and adds a <xref:System.String> message indicating the control is data-bound.
trans-unit.target: Se o controle associado derivado a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl> objeto é associado a dados, o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> método limpa o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.Items%2A> coleção e adiciona um <xref:System.String> mensagem indicando que o controle está associado a dados.

trans-unit.source: If the associated control is not data-bound and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.Items%2A> collection is empty, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> adds a <xref:System.String> message indicating the control is unbound.
trans-unit.target: Se o controle associado não associado a dados e o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.Items%2A> coleção estiver vazia, o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> adiciona um <xref:System.String> mensagem indicando que o controle não está vinculado.

trans-unit.source: Then, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> calls its base method to generate the markup.
trans-unit.target: Em seguida, o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> chama o método base para gerar a marcação.

trans-unit.source: The following code example overrides the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> method to customize the markup that is displayed for the associated control on a design surface.
trans-unit.target: O código a seguir exemplo substitui o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> método para personalizar a marcação que é exibida para o controle associado em uma superfície de design.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BackColor%2A> property is not defined for the associated control, it is set to `Gainsboro`, and the control is displayed with that background color.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BackColor%2A> propriedade não está definida para o controle associado, ele é definido como `Gainsboro`, e o controle é exibido com essa cor de plano de fundo.

trans-unit.source: After this is done, the base implementation of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: Depois que isso for feito, a implementação base do <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> método é chamado.

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner> class.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo de código é parte de um exemplo maior fornecido para a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets the data source component from the associated control container, resolved to a specific data member.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o componente da fonte de dados do contêiner do controle associado, resolvido para um membro de dados específico.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerable" /> containing the design-time <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource" />, resolved to the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataBoundControlDesigner.DataMember" /> of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerable" /> que contém o tempo de design <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource" />, resolvido para o <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataBoundControlDesigner.DataMember" /> do controle associado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.GetSelectedDataSource%2A> method returns `null` if a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A> property is not found, or if a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A> with the same name does not exist.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.GetSelectedDataSource%2A> método `null` se um <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A> propriedade não for encontrada, ou se um <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A> com o mesmo nome não existe.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A> cannot be resolved to the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataBoundControlDesigner.DataMember%2A> property of the associated control, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.GetResolvedSelectedDataSource%2A> returns an <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> interface containing the design-time <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A> não pode ser resolvido para o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataBoundControlDesigner.DataMember%2A> propriedade do controle associado, o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.GetResolvedSelectedDataSource%2A> retorna um <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> que contém o tempo de design de interface <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the data source component from the associated control container.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o componente da fonte de dados do contêiner de controles associados.

trans-unit.source: An object implementing an <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerable" /> interface and containing the design-time <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource" /> of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto que implementa uma interface <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerable" /> e que contém o tempo de design <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource" /> do controle associado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.GetSelectedDataSource%2A> method returns `null` if a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A> property is not found, or if a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A> with the same name does not exist.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.GetSelectedDataSource%2A> método `null` se um <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A> propriedade não for encontrada, ou se um <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A> com o mesmo nome não existe.

trans-unit.source: A control derived from the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl" /> that implements an <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IComponent" />.
trans-unit.target: Um controle derivado do <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl" /> que implementa um <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IComponent" />.

trans-unit.source: Prepares the designer to view, edit, and design the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Prepara o designer para exibir, editar e projetar o controle associado.

trans-unit.source: The designer host calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.Initialize%2A> method when it is ready to use the designer to render the control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl> class.
trans-unit.target: O host de designer chama o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.Initialize%2A> método quando ele estiver pronto para usar o designer para renderizar o controle que é derivado do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl> classe.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.Initialize%2A> method and its base methods configure properties and connect to events that are necessary for the operation of the designer.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.Initialize%2A> método e seus métodos base configurar propriedades e conecte-se para eventos que são necessários para a operação do designer.

trans-unit.source: The `component` parameter is the control, derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>, that is associated with this designer or is a copy of that control.
trans-unit.target: O `component` parâmetro é o controle derivado de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>, que está associada este designer ou é uma cópia desse controle.

trans-unit.source: The following code example overrides the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.Initialize%2A> method in a designer derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner> class to ensure that only instances of a control class named `SimpleRadioButtonList` are used by the custom designer.
trans-unit.target: Substituições de exemplo de código a seguir a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.Initialize%2A> derivado de método em um designer de <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner> classe para garantir que somente as instâncias de uma classe de controle chamado `SimpleRadioButtonList` são usadas pelo designer personalizado.

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner> class.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo de código é parte de um exemplo maior fornecido para a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner> classe.

trans-unit.source: Called when the data source for the associated control has changed.
trans-unit.target: Chamado quando a fonte de dados do controle associado tiver sido alterada.

trans-unit.source: Called when the data source for the associated control has changed.
trans-unit.target: Chamado quando a fonte de dados do controle associado tiver sido alterada.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.OnDataSourceChanged%2A> base method connects the associated control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl> object to the current data source and, if that is different from the data source to which the control was connected, updates the design-time markup.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.OnDataSourceChanged%2A> método base conecta-se o controle associado que deriva o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl> objeto à fonte de dados atual e, se for diferente da fonte de dados ao qual o controle foi conectado, atualiza a marcação de tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.OnDataSourceChanged%2A> method updates the design-time markup after connecting to the current data source.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.OnDataSourceChanged%2A> método atualiza a marcação de tempo de design depois de se conectar à fonte de dados atual.

trans-unit.source: The following code example overrides the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.OnDataSourceChanged%2A> method in a class that inherits from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner> class.
trans-unit.target: Substituições de exemplo de código a seguir a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.OnDataSourceChanged%2A> método em uma classe que herda de <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner> classe.

trans-unit.source: When the data source that is associated with the designer class changes, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.OnDataSourceChanged%2A> method is called and this code sets a variable named `changedDataSource` to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Quando a fonte de dados que é associado com as alterações de classe do designer, o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.OnDataSourceChanged%2A> método é chamado e esse código define uma variável denominada `changedDataSource` para `true`.

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner> class.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo de código é parte de um exemplo maior fornecido para a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner> classe.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> that indicates whether the design-time markup is to be unconditionally updated.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> que indica se a marcação em tempo de design deve ser atualizada incondicionalmente.

trans-unit.source: This parameter is ignored.
trans-unit.target: Este parâmetro é ignorado.

trans-unit.source: Called when the data source for the associated control has changed.
trans-unit.target: Chamado quando a fonte de dados do controle associado tiver sido alterada.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.OnDataSourceChanged%2A> base method connects the associated control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl> class to the current data source and, if that is different from the data source to which the control was connected, updates the design-time markup.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.OnDataSourceChanged%2A> método base conecta-se o controle associado que deriva o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl> classe à fonte de dados atual e, se for diferente da fonte de dados ao qual o controle foi conectado, atualiza a marcação de tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.OnDataSourceChanged%2A> method of the designer unconditionally updates the design-time markup after connecting to the current data source.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.OnDataSourceChanged%2A> método do designer atualiza incondicionalmente a marcação de tempo de design depois de se conectar à fonte de dados atual.

trans-unit.source: The value of `forceUpdateView` is ignored.
trans-unit.target: O valor de `forceUpdateView` será ignorado.

trans-unit.source: The following code example overrides the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.OnDataSourceChanged%2A> method in a class that inherits from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner> class.
trans-unit.target: Substituições de exemplo de código a seguir a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.OnDataSourceChanged%2A> método em uma classe que herda de <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner> classe.

trans-unit.source: When the data source that is associated with the designer class changes, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.OnDataSourceChanged%2A> is called and this code sets a variable named `changedDataSource` to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Quando a fonte de dados que é associado com as alterações de classe do designer, o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.OnDataSourceChanged%2A> é chamado e esse código define uma variável denominada `changedDataSource` para `true`.

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner> class.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo de código é parte de um exemplo maior fornecido para a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner> classe.

trans-unit.source: Callers should use the public <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.OnDataSourceChanged" /> override.
trans-unit.target: Os chamadores devem usar o público <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.OnDataSourceChanged" /> substituir.

trans-unit.source: A collection implementing the <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionary" /> of the added or shadowed properties to expose for the associated control at design time.
trans-unit.target: Uma coleção que implementa o <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionary" /> das propriedades adicionadas ou sombreadas a expor para o controle associado em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: Used by the designer to remove additional properties from or add properties to the display in the **Properties** grid or to shadow properties of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Usado pelo designer para remover propriedades extras da exibição ou adicionar outras propriedades a ela na grade **Propriedades** ou para sombrear propriedades do controle associado.

trans-unit.source: Control designers use methods that are derived from the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to shadow various control properties with corresponding design-time properties that the designer implements, and to add properties to or remove properties from the **Properties** grid.
trans-unit.target: Designers de controle usam métodos que são derivados do <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> método sombra várias propriedades de controle com as propriedades de tempo de design correspondentes que implementa o designer, e para adicionar ou remover propriedades do **propriedades** grade.

trans-unit.source: For controls that are derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl> object, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A> adds the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataFieldConverter> attribute to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.DataTextField%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.DataValueField%2A> properties of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Para controles que são derivados do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl> objeto, o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A> adiciona o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataFieldConverter> de atributo para o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.DataTextField%2A> e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.DataValueField%2A> propriedades do controle associado.

trans-unit.source: Override the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner.PreFilterProperties(System.Collections.IDictionary)" /> method to add properties to or change attributes of properties in the design-time property collection.
trans-unit.target: Substituir o <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner.PreFilterProperties(System.Collections.IDictionary)" /> método para adicionar ou alterar atributos de propriedades na coleção de propriedades de tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: Be sure to call the base method before performing other processing.
trans-unit.target: Certifique-se de chamar o método base antes de executar outro processamento.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the associated control should render its default action lists.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o controle associado deve renderizar suas listas de ações padrão.

trans-unit.source: Always returns <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: Sempre retorna <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.UseDataSourcePickerActionList%2A> property returns `false` so that a data source dropdown is not displayed with the **Choose Data Source** menu item in the **Common Tasks** context menu.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.UseDataSourcePickerActionList%2A> propriedade retorna `false` para que uma fonte de dados lista suspensa não é exibida com o **Escolher fonte de dados** item de menu no **tarefas comuns** menu de contexto.

trans-unit.source: Instead, this menu item displays the **Choose Data Source** dialog box, which allows the user to select a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A> and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.DataTextField%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.DataValueField%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Em vez disso, este item de menu exibe o **Escolher fonte de dados** caixa de diálogo que permite que o usuário selecione um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A> e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.DataTextField%2A> e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.DataValueField%2A> propriedades.

trans-unit.source: Override the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.UseDataSourcePickerActionList" /> property to return <see langword="true" /> if you want the control that is derived from the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl" /> class to display a data source dropdown with the **Choose Data Source** menu item in the **Common Tasks** context menu at design time.
trans-unit.target: Substituir o <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.UseDataSourcePickerActionList" /> propriedade para retornar <see langword="true" /> se desejar que o controle que é derivado do <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl" /> classe para exibir uma lista suspensa fonte de dados com o **Escolher fonte de dados** item de menu no ** Tarefas comuns de** menu de contexto em tempo de design.
